titles.title: An original resolution to permit amendments to bills implementing trade agreements under section 151(d) of the Trade Act of 1974 if such amendments relate to the domestic or foreign waterborne commerce of the United States.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Ford. With written report No. 100-183.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 346.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance by unanimous consent.

bill.summary: 9/25/1987--Introduced. Permits the amendment of bills in the Senate implementing certain trade agreements if the amendments relate to the domestic or foreign waterborne commerce of the United States.
